code: export var LOGIN_ACCOUNT_REQUEST='LOGIN_ACCOUNT_REQUEST';export var LOGIN_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS='LOGIN_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS';export var LOGIN_ACCOUNT_FAILURE='LOGIN_ACCOUNT_FAILURE';export var loginAccountRequest=function loginAccountRequest(){return{type:LOGIN_ACCOUNT_REQUEST};};export var loginAccountSuccess=function loginAccountSuccess(login){return{type:LOGIN_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS,payload:login};};export var loginAccountFailure=function loginAccountFailure(error){return{type:LOGIN_ACCOUNT_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var loginAccount=function loginAccount(email,password){return function(dispatch){console.log(email,password);dispatch(loginAccountRequest());fetch("https://mern-ubiqum-v2.herokuapp.com/users/login",{method:"POST",headers:{'Content-Type':'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'},body:"email=".concat(email,"&password=").concat(password)}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(json){return console.log(json);}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
